channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Fosus -- Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Fosus -- Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2020-11849|2024-08-04T11:41:59.919Z -- micro%20fosus -- identity%20manager
item.description: Elevation of privilege and/or unauthorized access vulnerability in Micro Focus Identity Manager. Affecting versions prior to 4.7.3 and 4.8.1 hot fix 1. The vulnerability could allow information exposure that can result in an elevation of privilege or an unauthorized access.
